name: DeVoid (tsmorisawa)
description:
DeVoid is a 2D platformer collect-a-thon where the items that you collect are the assets of the game itself. Find all of the collectibles hidden throughout the levels and bring the game world to life! Alternatively, find none of the collectibles and fight your way through the obscurity to reach your goal.

This game prototype was created in three weeks of occasional work as the final project for a university class on experimental game design in Unity.
